price: “Yɛ Wura, fa me bͻne kyε me, na fa m’awofoͻ ne agyidiefoͻ no (nso bͻne kyε wͻn) wͻ Da a akontabuo da no besie no”.
arabic: رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡحِسَابُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: rabbanā igh'fir lī waliwālidayya walil'mu'minīna yawma yaqūmu al-ḥisābu
